trying to get image uploaded but it wont upload:mad:
Save the image as a smaller file (ie compress) and try again, files that are too big won't uplaod.

[quote name="T205 GB" post=1458893]trying to get image uploaded but it wont upload:mad:[/QUOTE] 

If you want to send it to my email I will post it and most likely be able to tell you the issue with it. As Jobu said, it's probably too large especially if the picture is from a phone.
